Curator's comments: Hogarth et al. 2905, p. 118: "Coarse marble, broken on all sides." The piece was not found in excavations but brought to Hogarth by locals.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (767, no. 45)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BA.32)
